about_the_game:
In her quest to liberate the Kingdom of Nyarlaza, Elk-Saintess Yhoundeh, aided by Naia and her brother, Charles, faces the daunting task of overthrowing the tyrannical rule of King Sadogui and his legion of followers. Scattered across the world, Sadogui's Four Generals pose formidable challenges, prompting Yhoundeh to embark on a perilous adventure while confronting a myriad of magical adversaries along the way. On her journey, she encounters local villagers whose actions both hinder and aid her progress, gradually expanding the ensemble of characters and complicating her mission further. Can she fulfill her sacred duty as the Elk-Saintess and deliver the kingdom from its oppressive regime?


The RPG-style battles Yhoundeh partakes in are both fun and exciting! Encounters are initiated by bumping into enemies in the field and have a guaranteed escape rate. There are several different endings to unlock depending on how the story unfolds, and once you're done, there is also a New Game+ for you to enjoy to your heart's content.






An Engaging Storyline
With an interesting cast of characters and plenty of hidden lore for you to uncover, Yhoundeh's tale is deeper than it might seem on the surface! You're in for a treat as you unravel more about Sadogui, his minions, and the people of Nyarlaza, all of whom have their own backgrounds and personalities that are bursting with imagination.

Non-Linear Storyline Progression
Experience a thrilling non-linear storyline! Go at your own pace, visit any location you like in any order, and confront the consequences of your actions as you navigate a world where time itself is your greatest adversary. Prepare to be captivated by a narrative adventure unlike any other, where the story is yours to unravel at your own pace!

Expansive Open-World RPG
Enter a sprawling world ripe for exploration and adventure. You're free to roam around and battle enemies in any location you like or explore the land looking for items and Soul. From dense forests to the village center, discover a wealth of possibilities in the Kingdom of Nyarlaza.

name: Fallen Saint Yhoundeh

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: As the chosen Elk-Saintess, Yhoundeh bears the weighty responsibility of liberating the Kingdom of Nyarlaza from the tyrannical grip of Sadogui, a malevolent ruler. Can she prevail against a myriad of monstrous foes and vanquish the Four Generals to secure the kingdom's salvation?
